name: One Shot: A View By The Sea
name_original: One Shot: A View By The Sea
description:
A hastily put together game for: mini jam 108 (Seaside).

It's supposed to be a mini puzzle game, unsure how difficult it will actually be (maybe have some paper to make notes?)

Press 'e' to interact with red things.

WASD when viewing inside the telescope.

Music: Get Back Up - Silent Partner
